8.30.21  5:49 am   I tend to procrastinate a lot, then I have a burst of creativity and start a lot of things. Then I get overwhelmed and I finish none of them and slip back into procrastination. I am scared I will achieve nothing as an artist that way. So my question is: if I were your friend, what would you say to me in this situation?

8.30.21  2:55 am   holy shit i JUST got the tempo down on this song i've been practicing on the drums for months (im pretty new) and it was so wild i felt like everything just clicked, like all these abstract concepts about like counting and shit just came together for me and became solid. have you ever had an experience like that when something you'd been working on just suddenly made sense?

     is there a good way to describe it?
